description: Built a fully functional Real time Finance Tacking AI agent in under 48 hours using LangChain, Fetch AI.
Integrated the agent with external APIs and memory to perform multi-step tasks autonomously.
Collaborated with a team to deploy and demo the solution at the hackathon.

company: Vertex - Institute App for IIT Mandi
description: Developing an all-in-one institute app for students and visitors at IIT Mandi.
Implemented features like campus navigation, virtual tours, and Firebase integration.
Built scalable Flutter architecture with clean code separation and modular widgets.
Created a blockchain-based event ticketing system using Move language and Aptos blockchain.
Built a React frontend and implemented Web3 wallet connect for NFT-based ticketing.
Included features like resale marketplace, anti-bot protection, and royalty enforcement.
